POSITION SUMMARY: 

Security operations team is responsible for ensure that the Confidentiality, Integrity and availability of the organization is 
always  protected.  The  person  working  in  L1  SOC  team  operates  the  security  monitoring  solutions,  reacting  timely  to 
security events as identified. The role requires working in shift schedule to cover 24/7.
